title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 ยง 160.4 - Rates not in accordance with law
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 ยง 160.4 - Rates not in accordance with law

State Regulations

Penalties. The adoption and charging of a rate will not be deemed to be a violation of law within the meaning of section
2320 (c)
of the Insurance Law where it has been constructed and applied in the good faith exercise of reasonable judgment and competence and in fair consideration of the relevant factors and interests and in accordance with the procedures prescribed in the law and these regulations, even though it may subsequently be determined by the superintendent that the rate does not comply with the standards of section
2303
of the Insurance Law. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11
ยง
160.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
